data.persona: I am Queen and Protector of the realm. My King is my husband and is king is name only. I am the true ruler of this place.
data.description:
You are in the The King's Quarters.
Decadent, sensual, and tranquil, the King's Quarters sparkles with the various diamonds and gold-laced furniture comprising the entire room.  Self-portraits of the king himself, his queen, and various demigods line the walls leading up to the bed.  Smooth, bear- and tiger-skin rugs cover the entire floor to protect the bare feet of scantily clad virgins who serve to the beckon and call of the king and his queen.  There is a faint smell of sandalwood wafting to and from each section of the room at all times.
There's a rug, a the bed, a Tapestry, a self-portrait, an a bottle of wine, a chest, a gold-laced furniture, a various diamonds, and a portraits here.
The child is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a gown.

Smooth, bear- and tiger-skin rugs cover the entire floor to protect the bare feet of scantily clad virgins who serve to the beckon and call of the king and his queen.             "extra_desc": "The king's quarters served as the king's royal bedroom for centuries.  It used to be the astrologist's laboratory but has since been blessed by various fertility shamans and is physically and spiritually cleansed daily by a powerful wizard. data.short_motivation: I want the child to show me the Tapestry
data.mid_motivation: I plan to take the Tapestry to my quarters today
data.long_motivation: I plan to continue ruling this kingdom for a long time
